text: Suleiman Adamu Kazaure is the Nigerian Minister of Water Resources under president Muhammadu Buhari-led administration.http://www.nigeria.gov.ng/index.php/2016-04-06-08-40-29/executive/109-federal- ministry-of-water-resources ==References== Category:Nigerian government officials Category:1963 births Category:Living people
title: Suleiman Adamu Kazaure
